World.Name: Sophia
World.Entry: December, 1050: Sophia understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: Sophia is in Animal Empathy Training and practicing existing skills February, 1051: Sophia is in Animal Empathy Training and practicing existing skills April, 1051: Sophia can track the animals in the area May, 1051: Sophia is in Animal Empathy Training and practicing existing skills June, 1051: Sophia is in Animal Empathy Training and practicing existing skills July, 1051: Sophia can call a pet cat August, 1051: Sophia learns which way is North September, 1051: Sophia is in Survival Training and practicing existing skills October, 1051: Sophia learns to make a rudimetary fire November, 1051: Sophia learns how to hold a breath December, 1051: Sophia is in Swimming Training and practicing existing skills January, 1052: Sophia learns how to float on the surface without drowning February, 1052: Sophia is in Swimming Training and practicing existing skills April, 1052: Sophia is in Swimming Training and practicing existing skills
